extendedInfo.description: Trace, draw and recreate your photos using your s-pen or your finger. But it works on other devices.Tags: Galaxy note, Galaxy S3 S4, HtC flyer, HTC one, Drawing scribble, Tracing, effects, thinkpad, spen apps. samsung Galaxy note 2, s pen app. Artist studio

reviews.title: Very Cool
reviews.comment: This is one of the best apps I\'ve used on my note.  I feel like an \'Artist \'  :)
